description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of "Setup file of advance preparation" (jizen_setup.exe) (The version which was available on the website prior to 2017 June 12) allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

product.name: Installer of "Setup file of advance preparation" (jizen_setup.exe)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: (The version which was available on the website prior to 2017 June 12)
